summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 CARRY ON 4X6 TRAILER THAT WAS HITCHED TO A 2005 FORD FOCUS. THE CONTACT WAS DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 55 MPH WHEN THE REAR PASSENGER SIDE WHEEL LEAF SPRING LOOSENED, CAUSING THE TRAILER TO FLIP OVER ONTO THE DRIVER SIDE. THE CONTACT SUFFERED  A CONCUSSION AND A POLICE REPORT WAS FILED OF THE INCIDENT. THE VEHICLE SUSTAINED MINOR BODY DAMAGES AND WAS DRIVABLE, ALTHOUGH THE TRAILER WAS TOWED TO A COLLISION CENTER. THE VIN WAS UNAVAILABLE. THERE WAS NO MILEAGE.    UPDATED 06/24/11  *BF  UPDATED 12/19/11
